channel.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
channel.description:
PS4 wins this generation. PS4 will accept used games.PS4 will cost $399 while xbox will cost $500. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kWSIFh8ICaA[/youtube]
Xbox Team admitting xbox is shit. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5yC8FbgGnd0[/youtube]

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:182, topic:521462”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=639973.msg4318330#msg4318330 date=1371844279]

Xbox One will have an 8-core 64-bit x86 Jaguar AMD CPU @ 1.6GHz, coupled with a GPU that’s very close to the Radeon HD 7790.

The PS4, in comparison, has an 8-core Jaguar AMD CPU, with a GPU that’s around the same level as the Radeon 7870 (which is significantly more powerful than the 7790).

Holy love do you know how to read?
[/quote]

Can you and only you go in depth provide an in-depth analysis of on the differences between the GPUS?[/quote]
I clearly just stated that we are looking at possibly more than 2 gigs or more memory allocated to OS on the Xbox One compared to the PS4, so no. There is just more. Either way you’re still incapable of saying that the Xbox One is better than the PS4, it is clearly not physically valid. Do not try to put down the PS4’s SUPERIOR GPU just because you think that upon personal preference that the Xbox One is superior in any way, that is just sad.

Read full topic

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Can you and only you go in depth provide an in-depth analysis of on the differences between the GPUS?

I’m not an AMD fanboy, I don’t know the differences between the 2 cards. He said he would only trust his news source, and those 2 quotes are directly from it. If what Cole said is true, the PS4 blows the XBOne out of the water.

Cole1497:

[quote]Sony’s new console drives 1.84 TFLOPS as a result, compared to the new Xbox’s peak shader throughput of 1.23 TFLOPS.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.source: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:179, topic:521462”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=639973.msg4318300#msg4318300 date=1371842046]
Oh, you didn’t rip on me about saying that the hardware specs are very similar?
[/quote]
I was using your logic of “ignore the facts, you’ve never used it so you don’t know”

I’m saying that the Xbox One is better because I’m an Xbox fan. You’re obviously saying that the PS4 is better because you’re a Playstation fan. It’s pretty simple if you think about it.

I’ve never even owned a playstation. I’ve had an Xbox360 for 6 years and loved it. This next generation I’m not even getting a console. You’ve been saying “Kinect is better than the eye” and then going off saying “you can’t say Eye is better because you’ve never tried it”. I’ve posted the spec differences of PS4 and XBone and you’ve flat-out ignored them with the same “but they’re basically the same” when they absolutely aren’t.[/quote]
I will take this source over what you say about the hardware of each console.
http://www.extremetech.com/gaming/156273-xbox-720-vs-ps4-vs-pc-how-the-hardware-specs-compare

Read full topic

item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Oh, you didn’t rip on me about saying that the hardware specs are very similar?

I was using your logic of “ignore the facts, you’ve never used it so you don’t know”

3lv3n snip3r:

I’m saying that the Xbox One is better because I’m an Xbox fan. You’re obviously saying that the PS4 is better because you’re a Playstation fan. It’s pretty simple if you think about it.

I’ve never even owned a playstation. I’ve had an Xbox360 for 6 years and loved it. This next generation I’m not even getting a console. You’ve been saying “Kinect is better than the eye” and then going off saying “you can’t say Eye is better because you’ve never tried it”. I’ve posted the spec differences of PS4 and XBone and you’ve flat-out ignored them with the same “but they’re basically the same” when they absolutely aren’t.

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:177, topic:521462”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=639973.msg4318292#msg4318292 date=1371841522]
As for the Kinect, again, you can’t say it’s laggy because you haven’t used it because it has been upgraded for the Xbox One.
[/quote]
Then how can you say exbucks is better if you haven’t played it?
We’ve seen enough tech demos and with the released specs they’ve shown, anyone with half a mind can tell that the better deal is the PS4.[/quote]
Oh, you didn’t rip on me about saying that the hardware specs are very similar?

I’m saying that the Xbox One is better because I’m an Xbox fan. You’re obviously saying that the PS4 is better because you’re a Playstation fan. It’s pretty simple if you think about it.

item.source: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:175, topic:521462”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=639973.msg4318270#msg4318270 date=1371840432]

Like I said a bunch of pages back. You’re all ignorant to think that Microsoft will not respawn? Obviously superior.

Like I also previously said, It’s a family console still. I’m not bothered whether they were to take it off or not, PS4 has better specs, it doesn’t have a useless piece of equipment that you have to have and it’s still $100 cheaper.

You say RIP PS4, I don’t see how this changes anything IMO.

I never said RIP PS4… obviously they will do good. Xbox is just better.

This. Also, the PS4 and Xbox One have similar hardware that produce almost the same thing. It all depends on the software involved, like someone stated in one of the previous pages. Xbox LIVE, although you have to pay for it, is a lot more appealing and offers a lot more of content to do, play, etc… I have played on a PS3 before and I have first hand experience that it is not as good as the Xbox dashboard. The Xbox dashboard also isn’t as ‘dark’ as the PS3 and it is somewhat customizable with the background (Not sure if the PS3 dashboard is custonmizable or not).

It still lacks the performance of PS4. You cannot say something is better simply because it has a UI that YOU prefer. You do not have the ability to say it is better when it costs more, has lesser specs, and has a more expensive sub fee. That is just stupid and your point is invalid. All Xbox has is a bigger fanbase.

How does it lack performance if they have basically the same hardware and you haven’t even tested either of them to say that from your perspective?
[/quote]
Because physically the PS4 has a better GPU and the memory itself is supposedly allocated more towards gaming and less to its OS than Xbox One. PS4 has better system yet its CHEAPER.

And for people who don’t have their mother buying them everything, $40 does actually mean something.

Oh and Kinnect is some laggy, glitchy POS. It’s not even worth having.[/quote]

As speculated, both consoles have very similar hardware specs. The CPUs are virtually identical, they both have a GPU that’s derived from the Radeon 7000 series, and overall memory bandwidth is comparable between the two systems.
Source: http://www.extremetech.com/gaming/156273-xbox-720-vs-ps4-vs-pc-how-the-hardware-specs-compare

As for the Kinect, again, you can’t say it’s laggy because you haven’t used it because it has been upgraded for the Xbox One.

Read full topic
item.source: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One

Like I also previously said, It’s a family console still. I’m not bothered whether they were to take it off or not, PS4 has better specs, it doesn’t have a useless piece of equipment that you have to have and it’s still $100 cheaper.

You say RIP PS4, I don’t see how this changes anything IMO.

I never said RIP PS4… obviously they will do good. Xbox is just better.

This. Also, the PS4 and Xbox One have similar hardware that produce almost the same thing. It all depends on the software involved, like someone stated in one of the previous pages. Xbox LIVE, although you have to pay for it, is a lot more appealing and offers a lot more of content to do, play, etc… I have played on a PS3 before and I have first hand experience that it is not as good as the Xbox dashboard. The Xbox dashboard also isn’t as ‘dark’ as the PS3 and it is somewhat customizable with the background (Not sure if the PS3 dashboard is custonmizable or not).

It still lacks the performance of PS4. You cannot say something is better simply because it has a UI that YOU prefer. You do not have the ability to say it is better when it costs more, has lesser specs, and has a more expensive sub fee. That is just stupid and your point is invalid. All Xbox has is a bigger fanbase.
[/quote]
How does it lack performance if they have basically the same hardware and you haven’t even tested either of them to say that from your perspective?[/quote]
Because physically the PS4 has a better GPU and the memory itself is supposedly allocated more towards gaming and less to its OS than Xbox One. PS4 has better system yet its CHEAPER.

And for people who don’t have their mother buying them everything, $40 does actually mean something.

Oh and Kinnect is some laggy, glitchy POS. It’s not even worth having.

Read full topic
item.source: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:173, topic:521462”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=639973.msg4318270#msg4318270 date=1371840432]
How does it lack performance if they have basically the same hardware and you haven’t even tested either of them to say that from your perspective?
[/quote]
If they have “basically the same hardware” (they don’t), why would the xbone be $100 more expensive?

The PS4 has 8GB GDDR5 RAM, XBone has 8GB DDR3. Those aren’t “basically the same”.

Sony’s new console drives 1.84 TFLOPS as a result, compared to the new Xbox’s peak shader throughput of 1.23 TFLOPS.[/quote]

The Xbox One comes with the Kinect, which of course, would make the price higher. For the PS4, it does not come with the Playstation Eye, it is a $59 add-on. And we all know that the Kinect is better than the Eye.

Source:

Engadget

Sony's PlayStation 4 Eye is a $59 add-on, PS4 packs an upgradable 500GB HDD...

While the US press release for the PlayStation 4 mentioned details about games, used games and pricing, it did not confirm all of the specs for the console. I...

Read full topic

Sony’s new console drives 1.84 TFLOPS as a result, compared to the new Xbox’s peak shader throughput of 1.23 TFLOPS.

item.source: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

http://www.nbcnews.com/technology/every-search-engine-hates-xbox-one-except-microsofts-bing-6C10393891

Microsoft's Xbox One console has already had something of a social media problem. And it turns out despite the company's recent about-face on some its new console's most controversial feature, this Internet problem extends to search engines. Well, every search except for Bing.

Type the phrase “the xbox one is…” into popular search engines Google and Yahoo, and you’ll see the rest autofilled with some nasty results — “the xbox one is terrible,” “the xbox one is a joke,” “the xbox one is ugly.” Things like that.

Meanwhile, when the same phrase was put into Bing (the search engine that just happens to be owned by the same company currently preparing the Xbox One for market), it came up with the rosy phrase “the xbox one is amazing.”

Coincidence? I don’t want to jump to any accusations or conclusions. But if the swift departure of Microsoft studios creative director Adam Orth following his impolite Twitter rejoinders is any indication, the Redmond, WA-based tech giant doesn’t have much patience for online snafus at the moment.

Strangly enough, on the word “the” was taken out of the equation, Bing’s search results fall more in line with those of its rivals, as show by the image below:

Read full topic
item.source: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

This. Also, the PS4 and Xbox One have similar hardware that produce almost the same thing. It all depends on the software involved, like someone stated in one of the previous pages. Xbox LIVE, although you have to pay for it, is a lot more appealing and offers a lot more of content to do, play, etc… I have played on a PS3 before and I have first hand experience that it is not as good as the Xbox dashboard. The Xbox dashboard also isn’t as ‘dark’ as the PS3 and it is somewhat customizable with the background (Not sure if the PS3 dashboard is custonmizable or not).

Yes the PS3 UI can be customized, just like the 360. Being a PS+ member gives you free access to a handful of games every month, as well as access to their video and music streaming services. The PS4 UI has had a huge overhaul, and hopefully it is much nicer to use. Microsoft hasn’t changed the UI all that much, so we have to wait and see if Sony improved.

Read full topic

item.title: PS4 Just shit on the Xbox One
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Muroth:

PC lets you use a PS3 controller

The PS4 controller will also be compatible lol.

Elrick:

It also eventually becomes outdated, whereas you can continually upgrade your PC as needed. Plus extra subs fees. Pc has just you and your internet cost ;).

For the price point the hardware you get definitely isn’t too bad. Build me an 8 core PC with 8gb of GDDR5 ram for $400

$400 for the console, plus $60 a year for PS+ and it still takes several years before you reach the base cost of a high end rig. Even if we have to wait 6 years for another gen of consoles its still $760 in total for the PS4.

Read full topic
